function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited focus on community-level infection risk","Impact":"Neglecting community-level infection risk may lead to ineffective interventions and uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases within the community.","Mitigation":"Conducting more studies and simulations at the community level to better understand and address the infection risk within communities.","Technologies":"Community-level infection risk modelling and simulation tools.","People":"Community members, public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Environmental impact of FM interventions not fully considered","Impact":"Inadequate consideration of environmental impact may result in unintentional harm to the environment through interventions aimed at mitigating contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Performing comprehensive environmental impact assessments before implementing FM interventions to ensure minimal environmental harm.","Technologies":"Environmental impact assessment tools, sustainable design principles.","People":"Environmental experts, FM professionals, researchers","Owner":"Environmental agencies, FM companies"},{"Description":"Reliance on technical measures for health outcomes evaluation","Impact":"Over-reliance on technical measures may limit the understanding of direct health outcomes and real-world effectiveness of interventions in controlling contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Incorporating direct health efficacy observations and real-world data into health outcome evaluations, in addition to technical measures.","Technologies":"Health outcome monitoring systems, real-time health data collection tools.","People":"Healthcare professionals, researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, research organizations"}]}
